Name: worker_availability_gt_80
Description: Only include workers with availability greater than 80%

Name: blocker_status_active
Description: Consider only blockers that are not resolved

Name: sprint_current
Description: Apply constraints only to the current sprint

Name: story_points_gt_5
Description: User stories must have more than 5 story points to be considered

Name: snapshot_version_latest
Description: Apply rules only to the latest development snapshot

Name: team_size_lte_10
Description: Team size must not exceed 10 members (Scrum guideline)

Name: review_attendees_gt_3
Description: Sprint review must have more than 3 attendees
